name: Beastmode 2.0
description: Beast Mode 2.0, also known as BlueFire OG, is an indica-dominant hybrid of Master Kush and White Fire OG. It is a proprietary strain distributed by Green Umbrella in Seattle, and bred by Grass Roots Pharm. The strain was developed on the heels of Green Umbrella's other successful proprietary strain, Beast Mode OG. After another successful season for both Beast Mode OG and Seattle’s infamous running back, Grass Roots Pharm and Green Umbrella collaborated to bring Beast Mode 2.0 to the medical market, with plans to make it available for recreational consumption later this summer. Beast Mode 2.0 has a sweet mix of earthy berry and piney Kush flavors and has tested as high as 23% total cannabinoids by Steep Hill Lab. The effects of this hybrid are steered by the heavy indica properties that medical patients seek when fighting chronic pain, sleeplessness, or a lack of appetite.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Tingly, Sleepy, Happy, Pain, Stress, Muscle Spasms, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
